review: Wish their were more shows/movies available on prime instead of having to pay for them :-(

review: It will be good to have Chrome Browser inside TV stick as apps
author: arindam

review: I love this thing.....  I cut my cable out and now have  these on all my tvs along with an HD antenna.
author: Average Joe

review: Life changing.  Such an awesome device.  Cannot recommend this product enough.
author: Andrew M. Long

review: I am not good with electronics, this took less than 3 minutes to set up. I can't believe I didn't get this sooner. I haven't used all of its potential yet but worth the money!
author: mattb

review: Bought this specifically for Hulu Plus.  Hulu app doesn't work.  Very disappointed as customer support hasn't fixed this problem.
author: Sam L

review: Very good value for money - it is so easy to set up and use. Navigation takes a little getting used to - but that’s just a matter of practice. I recommend this product very highly. I also have an Apple TV but find the Fire Stick, on the whole a lot easier to use and definitely better value.Nice job Amazon - this is a very good product.
author: Martin R. Davis "Truth Seeker"

review: This thing is awesome.  Crystal clear HD channels.  I got it for a great deal when signing up for Sling Tv.  Everything i thought it would be.  Doesnt take up any room and is hidden from view.
author: DEN
